titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: transcribed cards s1: = lots of cross-outs on "Symposium" line s2: = "Cromen"? = "thai"? s3: = "ing"? and "Rome"? = "Jlat"? = "Tone and Rivin"? s4: = no idea, "Draghiheff"? = bunch of stuff crossed out, barely legible = "Shun"? editor of "Soviet Literature" = "Cour"? = no idea s5: = no idea s6: = no idea = no idea s7: = "Narration"? and "15" has something illegible before it, doesn't look like a month = no idea = crossed out payment = difficult to read payment info = no idea s9: = no idea s10: Verso has upside-down beginning of SACRESTE card s13: = "People"? written over and difficult to read = cross-out on name, hard to read s15: Half of a mailing label? = writing under "Claudius" is illegible s16: Another form, with writing "19-9 B" scrawled upside down
